film.name: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
film.description: A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas

film.name: Farscape
film.description: Thrown into a distant part of the universe, an Earth astronaut finds himself part of a fugitive alien starship crew.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: The action genre is a class of creative works characterized by emphasis on exciting action sequences.

genre.name: Adventure
genre.description: Adventure films are often use their action scenes preferably to display and explore exotic locations in an energetic way.

genre.name: Fantasy
genre.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that commonly uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary plot element, theme, or setting.

person.name: J.J. Abrams
person.biography: J.J. Abrams was born on June 27, 1966 in New York City, New York, USA as Jeffrey Jacob Abrams. He is a producer and writer, known for Lost (2004), Mission: Impossible III (2006) and Super 8 (2011). He has been married to Katie McGrath since 1996. They have three children.

series.name: Eat Me
series.description: The crew of Moya come across a diseased Leviathan used by the Peacekeepers as a prison for the criminally insane. It has been taken over by an individual who "twins" the humanoid inhabitants of the ship and uses them as a food source.
